title: Client lag/disconnect
body: My client had been weird lately. I know its not my internet because of that I have 0 lag in game. However, whenever I quene up and accept my match, it either joins the room very very slowly, or lags itself out about 5 secs after, making me have trouble switching sums and runes/masteries, and I have to relogin to my client in order for game to start (not in some occasions), after the starting timer hits 0. Its been acceptable in the way that I was able to play, but I just got a dodge timer from the match, that I did not quit. Does anyone know how to fix this?

replies.body: Your pc may be having a little difficulty running all the background animations in the new client. Try turning on low-spec mode in the client options, and let me know if that gives you a smoother time getting into matches and changing masteries.
low spec mode was already on. Is it my g-driver?

Hmmm graphics drivers shouldn't be affecting your ability to stay connecting to games. With that being said it wouldn't be a bad idea to go ahead and check for updates, but also reach out to our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They'll be able to look over your network logs to see if there's anything in there that seems off.

Ah apparently I think its how ATT does their data throttle. They let some data go thru at 246 kbs for like a second and doesnt let anything go through for a second, therefore letting me like cast spells but incoming data is like delayed/clogged making me float around, not able to click anything and so on
Thanks for helping me though :)
